deprecated: gcloud has been renamed to google-cloud. To get new features and bug fixes, you must use the new package.
description: Google Cloud APIs Client Library for Node.js
name: gcloud

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover -x 'regression/*' _mocha --report lcovonly -- --timeout 15000 test/* regression/* -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
